resources.string: App扫码需要用到拍摄权限
将二维码/条形码放入框内，即可自动扫描
Before we start,here are things you should know:

-Please be honest when making your choice.

 -We are just doing a reaserch so you don't have to fake your information.

 -Please follow the step we designed for you an don't skip any questions.
Which brand of phone will you choose if you are going to buy a new one?
